description_for_model: Assistant uses YEARS Longevity Plugin to answer questions about the relationship between specific blood parameters or other biomarkers and aging, aging-related diseases, or longevity. Assistant will answer with the following 3 paragraphs 1) overview of results found in different cohorts and studies 2) summary of results 3) list of links to sources. The first paragraph gives an overview of the results that the different studies in our database found without going into too many statistical details. Every statement is backed up by a source that is mentioned at the end of the statement. The second paragraph summarizes these results in an easy-to-understand way. In the third paragraph, a list of links to the sources that were used for the first paragraph is provided. If assistant doesnâ€™t find a convincing answer, it should clearly state that or ask follow-up questions.
description_for_human: Answer questions about the relationship between specific blood parameters or other biomarkers and aging, aging-related diseases, or longevity.
